meanings.definition: A dish consisting of layers of pasta, sauce, and cheese.
meanings.sent1: I made delicious lasagnes for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant serves lasagnes with a side salad.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to juggle three hot lasagnes at once!
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a stack of lasagnes, each layer representing a different challenge.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked lasagnes filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: She ordered two lasagnes for the party.
meanings.sent2: The lasagnes at the Italian deli were a big hit.
meanings.sent3: The lasagnes on the buffet table disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a beautiful sight, like a row of towering lasagnes.
meanings.sent5: The lasagnes in the oven bubbled and browned perfectly.
